definitions.body: wait for (prob. orig. twist, stretch, then of tension of enduring, waiting: As. ḳu’û II, I. wait, ḳû, cord; Ar. qawiya be strong, que=ah;un strength, also strand of rope; Syr. qawiy endure, remain, await, qawaoye0 threads, so Targum [[קַוִּין]] spider’s threads, web);—
